title: Spindrift (CRS041)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Laurel Holland first shared on the podcast in July of 2012 about the mysterious disappearance of her father.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Laurel Holland, Kevin Allison)
